thread.title: Millenium goes boutique..for the better!
thread.title_full: Millenium goes boutique..for the better! - Review of The Premier New York Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Art C
title: Millenium goes boutique..for the better!
text: Great quiet sister hotel to the next door Millennium Times Sq.. Unlike the Millennium, this hotel has free wifi, coffee makers in the rooms, complimentary continental breakfast and complimentary late afternoon wine reception!!! Very nice rooms, very quiet and with nice staff. Perfect for the Theater District
